code: import React,{useState,useContext}from"react";import{ListDetailContext}from"../../providers/ListDetailProvider";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChangeName=_ref=>{let{onClose}=_ref;const{changeName}=useContext(ListDetailContext);const[name,setName]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();changeName(name);onClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"change-name",className:"form-label",children:"Enter new name for this list"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"change-name",name:"changeName",className:"form-control",maxLength:"30",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Change name"})]});};export default ChangeName;
